title: Grow, Vegetables, Grow!
description: This book informs students of names and types of vegetables that can be grown in any garden, including a container garden on a rooftop in a city. The young boy in the story waters his various vegetable plants daily in hopes of creating his own salad.
reviewWords: cucumber, grow, onion, plants, salad, vegetables
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause and effect
awareness: Initial Blends : Discriminate initial consonant blend gr
phonics: Consonant Blends : Identify initial consonant blend gr
grammar: Exclamation Marks                : Recognize and use exclamation points
wordWork: Content Vocabulary                : Recognize and identify content-specific words
